summary: This document outlines the authorization of a Power of Attorney for Jeffrey Epstein, allowing designated agents to manage his brokerage and retirement accounts with Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. It includes details about the responsibilities of the agents, the limitations of the power granted, and the legal implications under New York law. The document also references internal communications regarding the onboarding of Epstein as a client and the specific requests for exceptions related to his accounts.
